ygData.subject: Re: Name suggestions
ygData.msgSnippet: I think you have some good ideas here but i would like to know what you would want our charter to say with all these different names.  the charter is going
ygData.messageBody:
I think you have some good ideas here but i would like to know what you
would want our "charter" to say with all these different names. the
charter is going to be just as important as the name...what would they be
in these cases?

-joe


On Thu, 29 Jul 1999, Christina Norman wrote:

> From: Christina Norman <tina@...>
>
>
> Ok here are three suggestions, feel free to comment!
>
> How about "The Chosen"? I like it because it's incredibly arrogant, with
> the implication being that being GLBT or queer-positive makes you better
> than if you're not. Well lets face it...doesn't it???? =) I'm suggesting
> "The Chosen" because "We Rock" doesn't sound that medieval, but lets face
> it...we rock!
>
> How about "Norath United"? I think it presents a pretty clear strong
> concept. On the downside it sounds a bit boring.
>
> How about "We Are Everywhere". I like it because it sends the positive
> message that GLBT people are everywhere. It also has mysterious overtones
> that I think make it cool in a standalone way.
>
> - Christina
>
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> ONElist: your connection to like-minds and kindred spirits.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
